_meta.description: Complete catalog of installable server programs with resource requirements, outputs, and dependencies.
_meta.notes: Program types: producer (generates uses), converter (transforms inputs to outputs), data storage (persists data), firmware (device operating systems).

sources.name: In-game observation
sources.notes: Data collected from program list and describe commands

sources.name: Discord Community
sources.notes: Data additions, corrections, and suggestions made by members of the discord community

corrections.correction: Added 8 firmware programs (rtkernel, hakernel, bladeos, vlanfirm, firewatcher, wirerat, netpeeker, dnsspam) and 4 new program_categories (router, switch, firewall, debugging)

future_additions.details: 1/1/1 cpu/mem/storage, doesn't run on player devices currently
For CCTV stuff and possibly printer (mod API has enums for printer)

programs.name: dns-lite
programs.description: Replies network-addresses to DNS queries. Production is limited to 3 compatible uses on the device's use stack.

programs.name: dns-server
programs.description: Replies network-addresses to DNS queries. Requires access to a running text storage program.

programs.name: sun-dns
programs.description: Enterprise grade DNS server. Requires access to a running text storage program.

programs.name: dnsmasq
programs.description: Automatically assigns network addresses and designated DNS server to network devices.

programs.name: kea
programs.description: Automatically assigns network addresses and designated DNS server to network devices. Requires access to a running text storage program.

programs.name: padu_v1
programs.description: Primary aggregation data unit. Supports text and image storage. Production is limited to 2 compatible uses on the device's use stack.

programs.name: padu_v2
programs.description: Primary aggregation data unit. Supports text, image and audio storage. Improved disk handling algorithm.

programs.name: padu_v3
programs.description: Primary aggregation data unit. Supports text, image, audio and video storage. Improved disk handling algorithm.

programs.name: poems-db
programs.description: Text-based database. Supports text storage usage.

programs.name: gitcoffee
programs.description: Open-source software repository. Supports software-updates requests.

programs.name: mailer
programs.requires: Running text AND image storage program
programs.description: Provides exchange email usages to users.

programs.name: voip-server
programs.description: Supports Voice over Internet Protocol for streaming voice messages to phones. Allows voip phones to be connected to produce stream-voice uses.

programs.name: rtsp-diva-r
programs.description: Support surveillance monitoring services. Allows surveillance accessories to be connected to produce stream-live-video uses.

programs.name: decentro-node
programs.description: Authenticate Decentro transactions. Decentro peers can connect to this program to perform peer-to-peer transactions. You may only spend decentro currencies that are accessible by decentro nodes.

programs.name: decentro-wallet
programs.description: Safeguards your decentro currencies from power loss or unscheduled shutdown events. Stored uses persist across device reboots.

programs.name: decentro-collector
programs.description: Collects decentro currencies over the network and accumulates them on the installed device.

programs.name: ubbt
programs.description: Analyzes user traffic behavior from a network tap to support botnet operations.

programs.name: rtkernel
programs.description: Normal capacity router firmware.

programs.name: hakernel
programs.description: High capacity router firmware.

programs.name: bladeos
programs.description: Normal capacity switch firmware.

programs.name: vlanfirm
programs.description: High capacity switch firmware that supports VLAN port tagging.

programs.name: firewatcher
programs.description: Basic Firewall firmware.

programs.name: wirerat
programs.description: Network tap firmware that produces inspect-user-packets use stack.

programs.name: netpeeker
programs.description: Basic Debugger firmware.

programs.name: dnsspam
programs.description: DNS blasting firmware that rapidly sends out udp/53 requests.
